history.proof: intros A a l H. induction l. - simpl in H. contradiction. - simpl in H. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_or_app. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_or_app. hauto use: in_rev, rev_unit, rev_involutive, in_inv. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_or_app,in_cons. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_or_app,in_cons. qsimpl time: 1 use: in_or_app,in_cons.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Set) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (rev l) -> In a l

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula Arguments Tauto.GFormula {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.TT {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.FF {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.X {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.A {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.Cj {TA TX AA AF}%type_scope Arguments Tauto.D {TA TX AA AF
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
rev : forall A : Type, list A -> list A
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
in_or_app : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a l \/ In a m -> In a (l ++ m)
in_app_or : forall (A : Type) (l m : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ m) -> In a l \/ In a m
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
in_eq : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (a :: l)
incl_Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l u v : list A), ~ In a l -> incl (a :: l) v -> Add a u v -> incl l u
incl_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), In a m -> incl l m -> incl (a :: l) m
Add_in : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> forall x : A, In x l' < -> In x (a :: l)
Add_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l' : list A, Add a l' l
nth_S_cons : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d a : A), In (nth n l d) l -> In (nth (S n) (a :: l) d) (a :: l)
in_app_iff : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), In a (l ++ l') < -> In a l \/ In a l'
not_in_cons : forall (A : Type) (x a : A) (l : list A), ~ In x (a :: l) < -> x <> a /\ ~ In x l
map_in : forall (A B : Set) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (xs : list A), In b (map f xs) -> exists a : A, b = f a /\ In a xs
NoDup_cons_iff : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), NoDup (a :: l) < -> ~ In a l /\ NoDup l
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
NoDup_Add : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> NoDup l' < -> NoDup l /\ ~ In a l
NoDup_remove_2 : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> ~ In a (l ++ l')
map_rev : forall (A B : Set) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f (rev l) = rev (map f l)
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
NoDup_remove : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A) (a : A), NoDup (l ++ a :: l') -> NoDup (l ++ l') /\ ~ In a (l ++ l')
ZMicromega.in_bdepth : forall (l : list ZMicromega.ZArithProof) (a b : ZMicromega.ZWitness) (y : ZMicromega.ZArithProof), In y l -> Wf_nat.ltof ZMicromega.ZArithProof ZMicromega.bdepth y (ZMicromega.EnumProof a b l)
Inductive Add (A : Type) (a : A) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Add_head : forall l : list A, Add a l (a :: l) | Add_cons : forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> Add a (x :: l) (x :: l') Arguments Add [A]%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Add_head [A]%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Add_cons [A]%type_scope [a] _ [l l']%list_scope
in_rev : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l < -> In x (rev l)
in_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {~ In a l}
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l

```coq
intros A a l H.
induction l.
- simpl in H. contradiction.
- simpl in H. apply in_or_app in H. destruct H.
  + left. apply in_cons. assumption.
  + right. apply IHl. assumption.
Qed.```

original: intros A a l H. induction l. - simpl in H. contradiction. - simpl in H. apply in_or_app in H. destruct H. + left. apply in_cons. auto. + right. apply IHl. auto.
